Text: Because you refuse to use your brain.

@all the ASSHOLES who hate islam more than anything .........

Islam means respect and piece ..... u hate islam because u dont understand the philosophy behind it , if the world can be established on ISLAM , the World will remain in piece ......

If u question about terrorism , then I must say , our holy PROPHET never supported violence unless it is a matter of life and death . He went to JIHAD only because Allah ordered him and his whole life he avoided violence ..... EVEN IF HE WAS ASSAULTED WITHOUT ANY REASON ....

so , plz hate something after u know about it better , dont show how DUMB u r in a public site like this ........

as-salamu-alaikum ar rahmatullah

for ur record ...... I have done some minor mistakes which I dont really care about ......

my main objective is to convey my MSSG to u all .......
